title: New tab shortcut question.
content: Is there a way to not have websites from your search history appear in the new tab shortcuts? I want to have only a few websites i've pinned in the shortcuts and not a flood of them from my history.
creator: grzegorzos41

title: Greek tones on Reddit
content:
Hi there! I' m unable to tone greek words (the toned letter just disappears) ONLY in the "text field" (not the title field) and ONLY on Reddit (no other forum). The only way to write greek words is when i select "markdown mode" in Reddit's "text field" for posts or replies. I' ve tried in private window with enhanced tracking protection and every add-on disabled with no luck. I' m not facing the same issue with Brave browser, so i decided to ask here for help and no on Reddit support.

OS: Manjaro KDE Firefox package : Official repositories (extra) Installed language packages: firefox-i18n-el
creator: chamdim

title: Browser update bug
content:
Hello,

I updated my browser to the newest version and attempted to watch tv on Xfinity but got an error then tried Netflix but got another message that my browser is no longer supported and to update it which I already did. The error codes are in the screenshots provided. I'm not able to watch anything now and I'm Pissed. Both websites work on Microsoft Edge and I've sent in two bug reports for it.
creator: kplatt88

title: Fonts broken after actualisation of Firefox
content: Firefox after actualisation, which cannot be turned off instead fonts shows squares at Facebook games as you can see at the picture, Also full screen mode constatnly is broken by showing black window, after refressing it works but in different period of times and again window becomes black
creator: marzena.b

title: Firefox turns icons into flickery rectangles
content: Whenever I open a lesson on duolingo, rectangles start to appear, flickering on the screen. It's completely fine on troubleshoot mode, but when i disable all my extentions on normal mode (i still had account containers on), it still happens.
creator: Chezaus

title: Tabs Relocated Spontaneously to the Bottom of My Window..
content:
Suddenly today my browser had switched any current tab to the bottom of my window, but it also only lets me see one at a time..which means I can't see multiple tabs open unless I close the current one. My tab bar is gone entirely and was up-top as it's always been, just under the URL box.

I didn't hit any key combos that I know of that would cause this, and I can't seem to find anyone else with the same problem when I search for a solution. Does anyone know what I can do to fix this?? It's very odd and annoying, I've never had it happen before now..

I took a screen-shot of the problem, showing what happens when I open a site or any tab:

Thank you very much for taking a look and any help with this strange issue,

-Chris
creator: deadbolt1

title: Error code: PR_CONNECT_RESET_ERROR
content: How do I get around this error message? I have just installed NordPVN, but have had this message on several websites ever since FFox Ver 1.02.Beta.
creator: 59mck62

title: Audio Isssues When Changing Tabs
content: On my other laptop I can be listening to something on a tab, then open or go to another tab & still hear the previous tab. But, on this laptop I can't. The tabs are not muted. I have hit the mute/unmute several times with no change. I would like to be able to hear something while working on something else. Please advise. Thanks
creator: mykimhome

title: Tela preta no Instagram
content:
Oi, gente. Tudo bem? Estou com um problema recorrente em um site em específico: o Instagram.

O navegador do Firefox aparentemente está dando um problema comigo quando eu vou assistir stories ou assistir um video de uma postagem. Ele aparece uma tela preta e somente reproduz o áudio. Testei outros navegadores, mas todos estão reproduzindo normalmente, menos o Firefox que eu mais uso. Gostaria de saber por que só com ele está assim? Tentei usar em modo privativo, mas não deu certo também.

Gostaria de uma ajuda, por favor para solucionar este problema.
creator: kojeja3492

title: Saved tabs on Startup is blacked out.
content: In the Settings menu, under General and Startup, the option to "Open previous windows and tabs" is greyed out, and I can't turn it on. I don't know how this happened. I've already checked for updates, and checked the troubleshooting section for help. Nothing works.
creator: niez.zein

title: [Feature Request] Export multiple tabs urls
content: Hi there, When I select multiple tabs, I would like to right click on them and see an option that lets me copy the urls of these tabs, it will be really handy.

title: Consumercellular.com website not working properly
